questions.question: What is the Action Figure Generator?
questions.answer: The Action Figure Generator is an AI effect that turns your photo into a fun action figure. It adds a plastic-like look and detailed styling to make your image look like a collectible toy.

questions.question: How long does it take to create an action figure?
questions.answer: It usually only takes a few seconds. The exact time depends on your photo, but our AI is fast and optimized for quick results.

questions.question: Is the Action Figure Generator free?
questions.answer: Yes! You can use it for free after signing up. We give you free credits to try creating your own action figure images.

questions.question: Are my photos safe and private?
questions.answer: Yes, your privacy is important to us. Photos are processed securely and deleted automatically after a short time. We never use them for anything else.

questions.question: What kind of photos work best?
questions.answer: Clear, well-lit photos of one person work best. Portraits or full-body shots with simple backgrounds give the best results.

steps.title: Upload Photo
bulletPoints: Start by uploading a clear photo that you want to turn into an action figure. For best results, use a high-quality image with good lighting and a clear view of the subject.

steps.title: Apply Action Figure Generator
bulletPoints: Choose the action figure style you want, then click the “Generate Action Figure” button. The AI will instantly transform your photo into a realistic-looking action figure.

steps.title: Download & Share
bulletPoints: Once your action figure is ready, you can download it to your device or share it with friends.
